title: LMDE 6 Codenamed “Faye”, Linux Mint 21.3 Is Planned for Christmas 2023
description:
Linux Mint 21.3 was announced for Christmas 2023, along with an EDGE ISO for Linux Mint 21.2 and the highly-anticipated LMDE 6 release.

The post LMDE 6 Codenamed “Faye”, Linux Mint 21.3 Is Planned for Christmas 2023 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Fedora Asahi Remix Announced as the Flagship Distro for Apple Silicon
description:
Fedora Asahi Remix has been announced as Asahi Linux's flagship distro for Apple Silicon based on the Fedora Linux distribution.

The post Fedora Asahi Remix Announced as the Flagship Distro for Apple Silicon appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
